message.content:
Yes, espresso is usually served as one shot or two shots. A single shot of espresso typically contains 6-8 grams of ground coffee and yields about 1 ounce (30 milliliters) of liquid. A double shot, also known as a doppio, uses twice the amount of ground coffee and produces around 2 ounces (60 milliliters) of liquid.

Preferences for single or double shots may vary depending on personal taste and the strength desired in an espresso-based drink like
